trans-unit.source: This type is used as a base class for typed-<xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> object generation by Visual Studio and the XSD.exe .NET Framework tool, and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
The type of objects in the source sequence represented by the table, typically <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref>.
Initializes a new <xref href="System.Data.TypedTableBase'1"></xref>.

This method supports typed-<xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> object generation by [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] and the XSD.exe [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] tool.
This type is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Initializes a new <xref href="System.Data.TypedTableBase'1"></xref>.

This method supports typed-<xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> object generation by [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] and the XSD.exe [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] tool.
This method is not intended to be used directly from your code.
A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that contains data to construct the object.
The streaming context for the object being deserializad.
Converts the elements of an <xref href="System.Data.TypedTableBase`1"></xref> to the specified type.

This method supports typed <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> object generation by [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] and the XSD.exe [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] tool.
This method is not intended to be used directly from your code.
An <xref href="System.Data.EnumerableRowCollection"></xref> that contains each element of the source sequence converted to the specified type.
Returns an enumerator for the typed-<xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref>.

This method supports typed-<xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> object generation by [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] and the XSD.exe [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] tool.
This method is not intended to be used directly from your code.
An object that implements the <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator`1"></xref> interface.
Returns an enumerator for the typed-<xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref>.

This method supports typed-<xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> object generation by [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] and the XSD.exe [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] tool.
This method is not intended to be used directly from your code.
An object that implements the <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator`1"></xref> interface.
